description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Blow up machine-gun nest, Destroy an ammunition-dump, Navigate a land-mine infested maze in a burned-out forrest, Rescue a helicopter pilot, Man dual M60's mounted on a helicopter, Search terrorist camp sites and burn down thier operations to find the intel on thier evil plans! One square mile of open sandbox! RPG's, Grenades, Heli Mounted M60's!
description.short: Blow up machine-gun nest, Destroy an ammunition-dump, Navigate a land-mine infested maze in a burned-out forrest, Rescue a helicopter pilot, Man dual M60's mounted on a helicopter, Search terrorist camp sites and burn down thier operations to find the intel on thier evil plans! One square mile of open sandbox! RPG's, Grenades, Heli Mounted M60's!
